name: 周世偉
objective: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.積分的技巧，2.定積分的應用，3.空間幾何與向量微積分，4.數列與級數，5.積分及比較審斂法，6.極座標的應用，7.偏導數，8.重積分。
schedule:
5. INTEGRALS (1-3 weeks):
Fundamental Theorem of Calculus; Find antiderivatives; Substitution Rule.
6. TECHNIQUES OF INTEGRATION (4-6 weeks):
Integration by parts; Trigonometric integrals and substitution; Partial fractions; Improper integrals;
7. APPLICATIONS OF INTEGRATION (7-8 weeks):
Applications of the definite integral by using it to compute areas
between curves; volume; Differential equation
8. SERIES (9-12 weeks):
Sequence; volume; Infinite series ;Integral and comparison test; Convergence tests; Power series; Taylor and Maclaurin series
9. PARAMETRIC EQUATIONS AND
POLAR COORDINATES (13-14 weeks):
Parametric Curves; Polar Coordinates; Lengths in Polar Coordinates
10. VECTORS AND THE
GEOMETRY OF SPACE (15-18 weeks):
Vectors; Vector-valued function; Parametrize a curve with respect to arc length
